attributes.action: Stop the Proposed Salcey Forest Windfarm
attributes.additional_details: The proposed 15 turbine windfarm at Salsey Forest must be stopped as it is a SSSI.  Turbines kill the winged and feathered, the massive concrete base will destroy habitat and species, the bridlepaths will be unusuable by horses who are frightened by the blades/noise, and the village of Stoke Goldington is in dire danger of flooding.
